title: Mr. District Attorney and Dragnet
description: https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr32020/CaseClosed713.mp3  Case Closed begins with Mr. District Attorney this week. content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with Mr. District Attorney this week. We’ll hear The Hot Rod Killer, from December 21, 1952.

(26:50) Our second story comes from Dragnet. From April 27, 1950, we’ll hear their episode, The Big Job.

Download CaseClosed713
